price: Kuma idan aka kirã su zuwa ga Allah da ManzonSa, dõmin Ya yi hukunci* a tsakãninsu, sai gã wata ƙnngiya daga gare su sunã mãsu bijirewa.
arabic: وَإِذَا دُعُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ لِيَحۡكُمَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِذَا فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ
footnotes: * Wannan yanã nũna cewa rashin yardã da hukuncin Allah kãfirci ne. Wanda ya kai ƙãra ga kõtun al'ada alhãli kuwa yanã Musulmi kuma ya halatta haka, bã da wata lalũra ba, ya zama kãfiri sai idan ya tũba. Bã ya halatta ga Musulmi su yarda da yin kõtunanal'ãda a ƙasarsu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā duʿū ilā al-lahi warasūlihi liyaḥkuma baynahum idhā farīqun min'hum muʿ'riḍūna
